short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This application provides you 'MySQL Console' shell windows.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This application provides you MySQL Console like "mysql' command. This MySQL Console can communicate to all MySQL Server directly, because this application has an ability to talk MySQL Client/Server protocol. You are able to send your query and receive the result from/to MySQL server only using this application without installing other any applications.

Features:
* Connect and logged in to MySQL servers which can access from your PC (to localhost, in same network, and etc.).
* Support SSL connection (without client authentication).
* Select DB, and execute queries.
* Full-screen supports.
* Multi-window supports. Each window has one connection.
* Query history supports. Currently, this application keeps 100 executed queries.

Limitations:
* SSL connection has been supporting.
* Stored procedures not supported.
* Local files not supported.
* This application talks with protocol 10. Therefore, MySQL Server 4.1 or higher supported.
* UTF-8 is used in this application.

Change history:
Version 2.2.10: November 17, 2014
  - Updated MySQL driver.
Version 2.2.9: November 13, 2014
  - Fixed the query parser bug.
Version 2.2.8: November 12, 2014
  - Fixed the query parser bug.
Version 2.2.7: November 12, 2014
  - Fixed the query parser bug.
Version 2.2.6: October 6, 2014
  - Fixed the bug regarding selecting rows with set/enum value.
Version 2.2.5: September 3, 2014
  - Fixed the query parser's bug.
Version 2.2.4: September 3, 2014
  - Fixed the bug when the resultset has error packet.
Version 2.2.3: September 2, 2014
  - Fixed the parser's problem.
Version 2.2.2: September 2, 2014
  - Fixed the bug which the query parser has stack overflow error at loading a long query string.
Version 2.2.1: August 25, 2014
  - Fixed the parser bug.
Version 2.2.0: August 24, 2014
  - Supported multiple query statements and "delimiter" command.
Version 2.1.0: August 12, 2014
  - Added the option to turn on/off the CN check in SSL connection.
Version 2.0.1: August 11, 2014
  - Fixed the bug at disconnecting.
Version 2.0.0: August 10, 2014
  - Supported SSL connection.
Version 1.3.1: April 25, 2014
  - Fixed the problem that fetching big packet was failed.
Version 1.3.0: April 25, 2014
  - Support the new Chrome Socket API.
Version 1.2.3: April 23, 2014
  - Support login without password.
Version 1.2.2: March 7, 2014
  - Update MySQL JavaScript Driver library.
Version 1.2.1: March 4, 2014
  - Refactoring.
Version 1.2.0: February 25, 2014
  - Add a function to change font-color, background-color and font-size.
Version 1.1.1: February 24, 2014
  - Remove "default_locale" property from manifest.json file to provide this application to all countries.
Version 1.1.0: February 24, 2014
  - Support retrieving statistics.
Version 1.0.1: February 23, 2014
  - Support offline access.
Version 1.0.0: February 23, 2014
  - First release.
